title: Detective
occurrences: No finger print either. How is a detective supposed to investigate?
Detective Mahimchandra will catch the murderer with just this card.
You've been rotting away at this detective agency for ages.
Instead of reading detective novels all day
Who's the detective here, Watson?
You're working at a detective agency with an empty brain?
Who told you that, Detective?
-Who's the detective here? -You, sir.
It's a lie, Detective.
He was a very dishonest man, Detective.
Detective, please forgive me just this one time.
And most importantly, they've produced a detective like Sherlock Holmes.
I'm reading a very interesting detective novel.
He will be promoted to the post of head of this detective department.
They should be sharpening their wit by reading detective novels but no.
-Watson, who's the detective? -You, sir.
How will you be a detective if you're so distracted?
You fleece us here at the detective agency.

A detective?

Wait, you can't say it all. I'm the detective, let me say it.

Mr. Detective.

I am a detective.
My only duty is towards my detective work.
I am a detective and that's my sole identity.
